DataElement.preferredName: First-Line Therapy Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response as to whether a patient meets the criteria for enrolling onto a clinical trial for questions related to prior initial treatments as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First-Line Therapy Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

Concepts.definition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received first li
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received first line therapy with at least radiotherapy and temozolomide?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least 6 months of one of the approved first-line treatments for pancreas cancer (the 5-FU-based FOLFIRONOX regimen or the gemcitabine-based gemcitabine plus abraxane combination)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least 6 months of 5-FU- or gemcitabine-based treatments for pancreas cancer (FOLFIRONOX, FOLFOX, 5-FU+ nal-IRI (MM-398; nanoliposomal irinotecan), or 5-FU (including capecitabine), gemcitabine-based gemcitabine plus abraxane, gemcitabine monotherapy among others)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient, or will the patient be, undergoing their first line or subsequent line standard of care therapy per NCCN guidelines?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled in the Dose Escalation Cohort, has patient received one line of treatment for their incurable cancer before enrolling in this trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received first-line treatment of temozolomide plus radiotherapy?
